Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring city plantings to be stormwater tolerant so as to facilitate stormwater retention and filtration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring city plantings to be stormwater tolerant so as to facilitate stormwater retention and filtration.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing biodiversity in sidewalk plantings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing native biodiversity in public landscapes.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing native biodiversity in public landscapes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to convening an advisory board to develop a strategic long-term plan to slow the spread of invasive plant species through measures including the creation of an invasive species list, regulation of related commerce and cultivation and public education.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Convening an advisory board to develop a strategic long-term plan to slow the spread of invasive plant species.
